fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: During the day, you may reveal yourself as the Governor, regaining your position to gain 3 total votes during the day. You cannot reveal if another role with a revealing ability already has and is alive.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You will not know who is a Loyalist, but you will know their roles. You cannot access the Loyalist chat, and you cannot perform any Loyalist factional ability. If all other Loyalists die, you will be notified, and you can perform the factional kill.
- You cannot, under any circumstances, have your goal or role changed while other Loyalists are alive.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to the end of the game and eradicate those who will not submit to the Governor's rule.
